headline: Melius Maintains Buy on AMD, Citing Multi-Year Growth Visibility
summary: Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMD) is one of the AI Stocks Investors Are Watching. On November 12, Melius Research raised its price target on the stock to $380 from $300 while maintaining a Buy rating. The firm maintains a positive outlook on the stock as it sees AMD on a realistic path to capture 10% of […]

headline: AMD and Eviden to Power Europe’s New Exascale Supercomputer, the First Based in France
summary: News Highlights The Alice Recoque supercomputer will expand Europe’s AI, scientific computing and research capabilities while ensuring energy efficiency and sovereignty.Alice Recoque will be powered by next-gen AMD EPYC CPUs and AMD Instinct MI430X GPUs to deliver more than one exaflop of HPL performance.
